text: haey brasenbae keat teangpir( aupoukamdeay) pyeayeam ch mrou nh aoy anak thveu shi ri k cheamuoy yeung( a l laoh) nouv avei del anak minban doeng vea te noh chaur anak kom sdabbangkeab puokkeat teangpir aoy saoh . te anak trauv katanhnhou champoh keat teangpir nowknong lokey nih daoy ampeula . haey chaur anakdaertam meakra anak del ban vilotralb mk rk yeung . banteab mk kanleng vilotralb robsa puok anak ku mokkan yeung temuoyokt . haey yeung nung brab puok anak nouv avei del puok anak thleab ban br pru td
